Roche AmplicorTM HCV , v.2.0 , sensitivity < 50 IE/ml ) 24 week end therapy . Secondary Objectives : - Verification initial virological efficacy week 12 , define negative HCV-RNA test result mean quantitative proof method , e.g . Roche AmplicorTM HCV Monitor v.2.0 ( sensitivity < 600 IE/ml ) . - Biochemical efficacy , define serum GPT value 24 week end therapy . - Virological efficacy , measure basis HCV-RNA value end therapy . - Biochemical efficacy define serum GPT value end therapy .
